<div class = "titlepage-title">
Acadia Climate Data Dashboard Project
</div>

<div class = "titlepage-subtitle">
This site is for downloading Acadia National Park climate data and data cleaning scripts. This data is used in the Acadia Climate Data R Shiny Dashboard (). Cleaning scripts only require the input of the downloaded datasets to run in R. 

Project github repository: <a href="https://github.com/Kylelima21/acadia_climate_dashboard">Acadia Climate Dashboard</a>
</div>

<h3>National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)</h3>

<ul class="primary-list">

<li class="primary-item">

<ul class="secondary-list">

<li class="secondary-item">

Data compiling script: <a href="https://github.com/Kylelima21/acadia_climate_dashboard/blob/main/scripts/compile_nClimGrid_daily.R">nClimGrid Daily Script</a>

</li>

</ul>

</li>

<li class="primary-item">

Monthly: <a href="https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/thredds/catalog/data-in-development/nclimgrid/catalog.html">NOAA Monthly Data</a>

<ul class="secondary-list">

<li class="secondary-item">

Data compiling script: <a href="https://github.com/Kylelima21/acadia_climate_dashboard/blob/main/scripts/complie_nClimGrid_monthly.R">nClimGrid Monthly Script</a>

</li>

</ul>

</li>

<li class="primary-item">

Data download requires cleaning scripts by Kyle Lima that build off Kate Miller's climateNETN package (<a href="https://github.com/KateMMiller/climateNETN">climateNETN</a>).

</li>

</ul>
